attributes.action: Act against Highways England for causing long delays for motorists.
attributes.additional_details:
The motorway M6 jct 17-20 is about 13 miles long. Highways England are upgrading the central reservation with plans of upgrading to smart motorway. The planned works will be around 2 years before completion. There are constant delays every day. The m60 ring road manchester is the same. 
I propose the highways agency concentrate on a smaller area. 3-4 miles max at any one time, to minimise delays.
attributes.background: Smart motorways are supposedly  helpful in keeping traffic flowing, But the upgrading works are being undertaken all over the major networks at the same time, Causing big delays for motorists. I think the upgrading works should be restricted to a 3 mile max distance to minimise delays to motorists.

rejection.details: We're not sure what action you want to be taken. You could start a new petition asking for Highways England works to be limited to a maximum of 4 miles.
